meanings.definition: Capable of being loved or worthy of love.
meanings.sent1: The puppy was so loveable that everyone wanted to cuddle with it.
meanings.sent2: The loveable kitten purred contentedly in the sunbeam.
meanings.sent3: The loveable teddy bear seemed to wink at me from the shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and loveable as a cozy blanket on a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The loveable character in the movie stole the hearts of all the viewers.

meanings.definition: Having qualities that make someone or something easy to love.
meanings.sent1: The loveable child always shared toys with others at the playground.
meanings.sent2: The loveable song brought tears of joy to everyone who listened.
meanings.sent3: The loveable cupcake with a smiley face decoration made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her loveable nature was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The loveable puppy's wagging tail showed its excitement to see its owner.
